title: Susie Gets Her Wish
description: Susie is in love with a man who is off limits, and she's not going to stop until she wins him over and has his baby! Read what happens when the whole "fam damily" goes camping together in the dangerous Appalachian Mountains and Susie gets more than she ever bargained for!  5,000 hot and steamy words!  Download a sample to see which fetishes are depicted!  WARNING: This story contains taboo erotic themes of an adult nature. Due to marketplace rules about product descriptions, I can't spell out the exact nature of the relationship since a large number of words are forbidden. In 'real' life, the relationship in this story would be legal but tread in a grey area of social acceptance, which is why this story caters to a particular fetish.  It is for mature audiences only. Please don't purchase this story unless you're sure you enjoy reading erotic depictions of taboo relationships between consenting adults.
author: Harley Baker
